column1: "description": "This data provides the list of drinking water quality affected habitations all over India as on 1st April 2012 due to contamination such as Fluoride
"title": "Download CSV for Water Quality Affected Habitations As On 1st April 2012(External Link that opens in a new window)"
"description": "This data provides state-wise number of minority concentrated districts and minority concentrated blocks all over India as on 31st March 2013."
"title": "Download XLS for State-wise Number of Minority Concentrated Districts And Minority Concentrated Blocks As On 31st March 2013"
